animeDescription: Kouta is the school's idol loved by all—his teacher and his fellow students. Well, at least the one teacher and three students we see—who are all girls. Actually, they don't actually "love" him all that much; they just want to screw his brain out.   (Source: AniDB)
animeStaff: [['Awai Shigeki', ['Director']], ['Tominaga Tsuneo', ['Episode Director', 'Storyboard']], ['Miyazaki Maya', ['Original Creator']], ['Ishihara Keiji', ['Character Design', 'Chief Animation Director']]]
